Title: Relates to payments in lieu of taxes for projects approved by industrial development agencies
Summary: Requires that prior to the approval of any application for a payment in lieu of taxes agreement by an industrial development agency, the agency shall notify certain school boards and consult with certain district superintendents.
LawCode: Amd ยง859-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to payments in lieu of taxes for projects approved by industrial development agencies
